messages.content:
"DAMAGE REPORT: Water damage observed on a base cabinet with double doors located on Floor 0.

ACTION REQUIRED:
- Call get_elements_by_room with 'floor 0' (the location mentioned in the report)
- Search the returned elements for cabinets (names containing 'Cabinet' or 'Base Cabinet')
- For each cabinet found, extract its GUID and call get_element_details
- Provide a structured report: [Element Name] | [Type] | [GUID] | [Properties]"
I couldn't find any elements in a room named "Floor 0". Please provide a valid room name. You can use the `list_available_spaces()` function to see available room names.

"COMPLIANCE AUDIT: Annual inspection of external facade.
REQUIRED ACTION: Query Floor 0 using get_elements_by_room("Floor 0").
Find all exterior walls (search for 'Innerv√§gg' or 'Wall' in element names).
For each wall found, use get_element_details(guid) to extract Type, Material, Fire Rating.
DELIVERABLE: Table with [Element Name] | [Type] | [GUID] | [Material] | [Fire Rating]"
I couldn't find any elements in a room called "Floor 0". Please provide a valid room name. You can use `list_available_spaces()` to see available room names.

summary: Completed 2 test scenarios using MCP architecture
